username.title: Username
username.description: The username to use when logging in to the remote server.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used for authentication when logging in to the remote server.

private_key.title: Private Key
private_key.description: SSH private key used for authentication when logging in to the remote server.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port number used by the remote server for SFTP connections.

stream_name.title: Stream Name
stream_name.description: The name of the stream or table you want to create.

file_type.title: File Type
file_type.description: The file type you want to sync. Currently only CSV and JSON files are supported.

separator.title: CSV Separator
separator.description: The separator used in the CSV files. Leave this field blank if you want to use the Sniffer functionality.

folder_path.title: Folder Path
folder_path.description: The optional directory on the remote server to sync files from. See the setup guide for more information.

file_pattern.title: File Pattern
file_pattern.description: The optional regular expression to specify files for sync. See the setup guide for more information.
examples: log-([0-9]{4})([0-9]{2})([0-9]{2}) - This will filter files which  `log-yearmmdd`

file_most_recent.title: Most recent file
file_most_recent.description: Toggle on to sync only the most recently modified file that matches the folder path and file pattern.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for all incremental streams, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.
